pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Interface to 'Mapbox GL JS' // Makes 'Mapbox GL JS' https://docs.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/api/, an open source JavaScript library that uses WebGL to render interactive maps, available within R via the 'htmlwidgets' package. Visualizations can be used from the R console, in R Markdown documents and in Shiny apps.
